subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Hawks and the Miami Heat must replay the final 51.9 seconds of their game last month because the N.B.A. said the official scorer ruled incorrectly that Shaquille O’Neal fouled out. This will be the first time since 1982 that the league has sent teams back on the court for a replay.
